snippet: Party leaders are expected to meet to decide whether to stay in the coalition after an aide of Prime Minister Petr Necas was placed in custody for corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Party leaders are expected to meet to decide whether to stay in the coalition after an aide of Prime Minister Petr Necas was placed in custody for corruption charges.

headline.main: Coalition Party Weighs Support of Czech Leader
headline.print_headline: Coalition Party Weighs Support Of Czech Leader
